title: OliverLucas1
author: OliverLucas1
content: I have 50 IPhone pro max 512gb SEALED în different color. I would like to mention that I received The phones from a friend with whom I am in this business  and IT doesn't matter how i got them I m selling them on Bitcoin because i want to lose track of them. I give them for 800€ each or 36,000€ all.I send anywhere by curier as long as you pay for The transport.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: How are you arranging for payment to be made?  Are you accepting escrow or are you shipping the product first to trusted members?  Any pictures so we know that you have the phones and aren't attempting a drop shipment from some sketchy website?  I think you will probably need to supply more information if you want anyone to consider this offer, especially from a brand new account.  Good luck.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: OliverLucas1 on May 29, 2022, 07:02:37 PMI have 50 IPhone pro max 512gb SEALED în different color. I would like to mention that I received The phones from a friend with whom I am in this business  and IT doesn't matter how i got them I m selling them on Bitcoin because i want to lose track of them. I give them for 800€ each or 36,000€ all.I send anywhere by curier as long as you pay for The transport. Another case of the "deal being too good to be true"The fact that you don't to share the details clearly shows that there is everything wrong about your deal.It's either a scam or the phones were acquired through illegal means, which translates to the buyer landing into trouble once the law enforcement catch up with him or her.

comments.author: ChrisPop
comments.body: Bitcoin's reputation gets a hit due to this kind of posts. Yes, trade should be free and without borders in an ideal world, but that doesn't mean we should allow any illegal activities. Having 50 of them "on stock" is certainly a red flag. Of course it does matter how you got in possession of them. Any sane and ethical person would not take the deal especially without proof of purchase. Moreover you're a newbie account. So for anyone interested in this deal, proceed carefuly or better not proceed at all.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: OliverLucas1 on May 29, 2022, 07:02:37 PM...IT doesn't matter how i got them ...I can be potential interested in such kind of deal but you have to clarify this aspect.Because it's interesting see some prof this is a legit transaction and these are not related to some criminal activities Why you are not selling by yourself in a local market? Meanwhile, are you able to proof ownership? Likewise a photo with your nickname and date of photo?Just to not completely waste the time...

comments.author: definevalue
comments.body: I'll pay you $500 each for all of them in bitcoin with escrow by someone reputable.

comments.author: draajat
comments.body: Quote from: OliverLucas1 on May 29, 2022, 07:02:37 PMI have 50 IPhone pro max 512gb SEALED în different color. I would like to mention that I received The phones from a friend with whom I am in this business  and IT doesn't matter how i got them I m selling them on Bitcoin because i want to lose track of them. I give them for 800€ each or 36,000€ all.I send anywhere by curier as long as you pay for The transport. Will u send it to another country?
